messages.message: Are we doing anything to track the stability of prompts over time? I ran the same set of Medicare benefit summary docs through an app one day. The next day when I ran the same docs through the same app I received different results.

can you share which one is the latest result, which one has the right result, and when did you run each result?

but on the high level, GPT is non-deterministic, so we can't guarantee the query is gonna come back every time the same; open AI can also constantly update their model

The file where the `monthly_plan_premium = $0` is the correct result that was from the initial run. Where the `monthly_plan_premium = $15` is the second run with the incorrect value.

Admittedly these are complex docs and the prompts are pretty basic just to test this specific behavior. More complex prompts might solve some of this (I'm going to test that out as well).

Given how GPT is non-deterministic it might be helpful for the end user to quantify how their designed prompts are performing. Having that feedback could help the end user maintain and improve their apps.
do you remember when did you generate the old result? (assume the new result is generated today)
I did 3 runs 6/1, 6/2 and 6/3. The two above are from 6/1 and 6/2.
